Package com.gsm.controller.api

Class UserApiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.controller.api.UserApiController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/users")
public class UserApiController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for handling all API requests related to User management.

public java.util.List<UserDto> searchUsers​(@RequestParam(required=false)

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDto> getCurrentUserInfo​(@AuthenticationPrincipal

        Retrieves information about the currently authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        userDetails - The CustomUserDetails object injected by Spring Security.
        Returns:

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDto> saveUser​(@RequestBody
                                                                 UserDto userDto)
        Saves a user (creates a new one or updates an existing one).
        Parameters:
        userDto - The user data sent in the request body.
        Returns:

      • deactivateUser

        @PostMapping("/{id}/deactivate")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> deactivateUser​(@PathVariable
                                                                              java.lang.Long id)
        Deactivates a user by setting their active flag to false.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user to deactivate.
        Returns:
        An empty ResponseEntity with a 200 OK status.

      • activateUser

        @PostMapping("/{id}/activate")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> activateUser​(@PathVariable
                                                                            java.lang.Long id)
        Activates a user by setting their active flag to true.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user to activate.
        Returns:
        An empty ResponseEntity with a 200 OK status.
